aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.content: ERSIEL embodies our vision of delivering the best from South Korea to the world, and each letter of our name represents a value we believe in and promise to our partners.

values.label: Reliability
values.text: Shipments and services customers can always trust.

values.label: Spirit
values.text: The passion and dedication of our team driving success.

values.label: Expansion
values.text: Opening new markets and growing opportunities worldwide.

values.label: Leadership
values.text: Leading the way in global exports.

aboutUs.closing: ERSIEL moves forward with your trust.

cards.title: Global Leadership
cards.desc: Our team unites Korean and international leaders with global expertise.

cards.title: Decades of Experience
cards.desc: Each member brings over 10 years of professional experience.

cards.title: Diverse Expertise
cards.desc: Expertise covers trade, finance, operations, and cultural development.

cards.title: Proven Excellence
cards.desc: Known for delivering complex projects with precision and impact.

aboutCeo.title: About CEO
aboutCeo.content: Nermeen began her journey in South Korea on a government scholarship and became the only foreign student at Korea University of Technology and Education to earn a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Electronic Engineering. At 19, she mastered the Korean language and excelled in a highly competitive environment, recognized as a resilient, disciplined, and ambitious individual. Her career spans robotic operations engineering, fintech, exports, and business development, combining technical expertise with global business vision. Now, as CEO of ERSIEL, Nermeen leads with a global mindset, uniting engineering excellence with international business ambition.
